topic: dow closes more than 450 points lower, s&p 500 pulls back from record: live updates

text: The stock market has taken a drastic turn, with the Dow plummeting more than 450 points
The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed down by more than 450 points
The S&P 500 also took a hit, pulling back from its record high
Market analysts point to a range of factors that may have contributed to the decline
Economic uncertainty and concerns over the global market outlook are possible causes
The market continues to react to these changes
It remains to be seen what the long-term effects of this downturn will be
Whether the market will be able to recover from this significant drop is uncertain

The current market situation is causing concern among investors

The market's reaction to the downturn will be closely watched
